com.giisoo.utils.base

类 RSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giisoo.utils.base.RSA

  • public class RSA
extends Object
    RSA utility, RSA is using for encode some short key (such as password or DES key), it's slow, and output longer data, NOT suitable for encode file.
    作者:
    yjiang

      • decode

        public static byte[] decode(byte[] data,
            String pri_key)
        decode data with private key.
        参数:
        data - the data
        pri_key - the pri_key
        返回:
        the byte[]

      • encode

        public static byte[] encode(byte[] data,
            String pub_key)
        encode the data with the public key.
        参数:
        data - the data
        pub_key - the pub_key
        返回:
        the byte[]

      • generate

        public static RSA.Key generate(int length)
        generate key pair which include public and private key.
        参数:
        length - the length
        返回:
        the key

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        The main method.
        参数:
        args - the arguments
